resources.string: How Many Mode \n Available for Pen Tool?
Welcome To UYLAB! \n You Can Login Here, as guest or student

1. Integrate with our Youtube Channel so that visitor can watch our youtube videos directly from the app. Every 1mint video watch will add 2 rewards points. 

 2. Video like, subscribe reward point systems. 

 3. Daily login Reward Point. 

 4. Refer a Friend by code - Reward Point 

 5. Social Share button - Earn Reward Points bu sharing our contents on social media. 

 6. Content Submit system. Anyone can publish a post, we will review it and give reward points for each approved post. 

 7. Earn Reward point by App Review on Playstore.
